title: Choux buns filled with goats’ cheese, toasted walnuts and caramelised red onions
description: Choux buns make wonderful party canapés and you won’t be disappointed by this recipe. Vary it by using a different type of cheese or nut for the filling.Equipment and preparation: you will need a piping bag, a 1cm/½in plain nozzle and a wide star nozzle.
ingredients: 200g/7oz soft goats’ cheese (soft-textured rather than waxy)
